html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

If you’ve been dreaming of owning the latest gadgets but couldn’t afford them, Verizon’s Holiday Deal Days might just be your chance. The carrier is offering massive discounts and trade-in offers that make high-end smartphones, gaming bundles, and accessories more affordable, which is perfect if you've been holding out. 

Trade up for Pixel 9 Pro and others

With Verizon's Deal Days, you can switch your old phone in any condition and walk away with a new iPhone 16 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro, or Galaxy S24+. The deal ends on December 17, 2024, so you have until then to take advantage of these offers.

However, keep in mind that supplies are limited, so it’s best to act sooner rather than later if there’s something you’ve been eyeing.

Here are the phones, wearables, and other packages currently available:

Android phones

  • Google Pixel 9 Pro: Free with the trade-in of any old Google Pixel phone on select plans. Includes a Google Watch and tablet.
  • Samsung Galaxy S24+: Free with the trade-in of any old Samsung phone on select plans. Includes a Samsung Watch and tablet.
  • Samsung S24 FE: Free with the trade-in of any old Samsung phone on select plans. Includes a Samsung Watch and tablet.

Apple iPhones

Get the iPhone 16, iPhone 15, and iPhone 13 series, among other collections, free. You're eligible with a trade-in of any old iPhone in any condition on select plans. Includes an Apple Watch Series 10 and iPad 10th gen.

  • iPhone 16 Pro.
  • iPhone 16.
  • iPhone 16 Pro Max.
  • iPhone 16 Plus.
  • iPhone 15.
  • iPhone 15 Plus.
  • iPhone 14.
  • iPhone 14 Pro Max (Certified Pre-Owned)
  • iPhone SE (3rd Gen)

Wearables

  • Gizmo 3: Get free 2-day shipping with a new line, $50 off, and $130 off with a phone purchase. Payment starts at $2.22 monthly for 36 months, and you can collect it in-store with free express pickup. It has 8GB of storage and no camera.
  • Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen): Offers $180 off with trade-in, $299.99 off with a 5G iPhone purchase, and free 2-day shipping with a new line. It costs $8.33 monthly for 36 months.
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 7: Included with eligible Samsung deals. Get it free with the purchase of a 5G Android smartphone.

Internet Offers

  • Xbox Gaming Bundle: Includes an Xbox Stereo Headset, Wireless Controller, and $50 Xbox gift card for new Verizon Home Internet customers.
  • Netflix and Max (with ads) perk: Free for 12 months for Verizon Home Internet customers on select plans. You must activate the internet service, enrol in the perk within 60 days of installation, or by March 2, 2025, whichever is sooner, and register with Netflix and Max within 90 days of enrolment. 

Receive up to $250 worth of credits

Apart from smartphones, internet, and wearables, Verizon’s Holiday Deal Days include discounts on audio accessories, gaming bundles, smart home devices, streaming accessories, and chargers.

You should consider these deals if you're looking to save on holiday gifts, upgrade your phone, or enjoy perks like streaming services and gaming bundles. You can also get cashback with the Verizon Visa Card and free streaming subscriptions for a year.

If you make eligible purchases on accessories and electronics with the Visa Card between December 3 and December 18, 2024, you can earn a statement credit of up to $250.

The maximum purchase limit is $1,000 and the credit will apply to your account within 1-2 billing cycles. It reduces the cost of your purchases greatly, which can be useful if you're buying multiple items or making a larger purchase.

Irene is an experienced writer with four years in the Tech, E-commerce, and Food niches. She currently writes for Talk Android and Android Police, where she geeks out about the latest innovative practices, solutions, and gadgets. When not writing, Irene embraces her inner couch potato, finding joy in gaming, singing, music, and of course, eating.
